title: Xi's military purge raises doubts about China's readiness to go to war: Study
summary_full: China's military is undergoing a massive shake-up, with dozens of senior officers, including top generals, detained or disappearing without explanation. This extensive purge, impacting half of the PLA's senior leadership, raises serious questions about the military's combat readiness and ability to launch major campaigns, particularly concerning Taiwan. The removals are attributed to loyalty concerns, potentially hindering future leadership development.
